column2: There is a new wave of enemy ships. This time they're big, they look like ground attack ships.

They'll probably try to get their landing parties to Earth. I don't really know what they're trying to achieve, to be honest, - capture the entire planet with a small force? Ground forces are ready to attack their disembarcation points, but we'd better finish this before they reach the surface. So try to destroy the ground attack ships first.
